channel.title: [562] How do i remove/change the drop rate of coins?
channel.description:
The title does not say it all. Please read!
Hello there. So i have downloaded a new source to code in, and i like the source but the drop rates of the coins is so high. Its 100% actually and always drop 1-3m. Now the drop's are not in the usual npcdrops.cfg or npcdrops.xml.
So: -The drop is for all monsters -The drop is not in the usual npcdrops.cfg or npcdrops.xml
Please, if you know it.
Leave the comment below!
:)

item.title: [562] How do i remove/change the drop rate of coins?
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

emtrescue:

npcconstants maybe or he has it coded in under the npc drop void… i have the coid in a tut called bone fix… its the same thing but thats the drop method

Yea its the same thing, i want to change it to bones can i have the link of that tutorial please?

Also, where can i find the NpcConstants?

Read full topic
